column1: last updated October 2015 by Jack Dougherty, Trinity College, Hartford CT
PopACS2013: Population from American Community Survey, 5-year estimate (2009-13), US Census via Social Explorer (http://socialexplorer.com)
IncomePerCapACS2013: Income per capita (adults and children), American Community Survey, 5-year estimate (2009-13), US Census via Social Explorer (http://socialexplorer.com)
IncomeTotalACS2013: IncomePerCap * Population (used for merger calculations)

ENGLY2012: Equalized Net Grand List (full-value estimate of all taxable property: residential, commercial, industrial, vacant land), 2012 Grand List, Connecticut Office of Policy and Management (OPM), http://www.ct.gov/opm/cwp/view.asp?a=2987&q=385970&opmNav_GID=1807
Note: Only 3 data columns are necessary (Pop, IncomeTotal, ENGLY) when joining town data to polygons to create geojson file (data.js)
